biography: Moonparticle is the ‘all-terrain lunar vehicle’ music collective of guitarist/producer Niko Tsonev (ex-Steven Wilson, Lifesigns), featuring performances and creative contributions by an extraordinary group of musicians: pianist Adam Holzman (Miles Davis, Robben Ford), saxophonist Theo Travis ( Robert Fripp, David Gilmour), drummer Craig (Frost*, Steven Wilson), singer Grog (Die So Fluid), visual artist Brett Wilde. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
name: Moonparticle

lastfm.bio_content: Moonparticle is the ‘all-terrain lunar vehicle’ music collective of guitarist/producer Niko Tsonev (ex-Steven Wilson, Lifesigns), featuring performances and creative contributions by an extraordinary group of musicians: pianist Adam Holzman (Miles Davis, Robben Ford), saxophonist Theo Travis ( Robert Fripp, David Gilmour), drummer Craig (Frost*, Steven Wilson), singer Grog (Die So Fluid), visual artist Brett Wilde. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
